title: Cant get into a game
body: Everytime i want to get into a game I get a BugSplat then if I recconect the game immediatly crashes everytime. What shoud I do?

replies.body:
Please contact Riot Games support, they can help you almost in every error. [Click here to get help!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
Beszélhetsz magyarul is, itt csak magyarok vannak ;)

Először egy kérdést ha megengedsz, azért írsz angolul mert nem tudsz magyarul, vagy csak úgy? Nyugodtan írj magyarul, megértjük.

FIrst of all let me ask you a question. Are u using a Hungarian forum on purpose, or because you are lost? If u can not speak hungarian, let me 
instruct you a bit. If you change the ..../hu in the name of the site, you can choose your own native lang to discuss.

I can help you too,but first i need to know what language i can use to do it. ^^
